repo.name: OpenLyst F-Droid Repository
repo.description: Free and open source Android applications from OpenLyst

docan.name: Docan
docan.summary: Universal AI chat application with Liquid Glass design
docan.description: Docan is a universal AI chat application featuring a stunning Liquid Glass design. Connect with various AI providers and enjoy a seamless chat experience across all your devices.

doudou.name: Doudou
doudou.description: Break free from corporate streaming platforms. Doudou connects to your self-hosted music services like Jellyfin, Plex, and Navidrome, giving you complete control over your music library.

finar.name: Finar
finar.description: A beautiful, modern multi-platform Jellyfin client built with Flutter. Features native video playback powered by media_kit, glassmorphism design with blur effects and glass-like components, dark mode, offline support with Hive, and adaptive UI optimized for desktop, mobile, and TV.

klit.name: Klit
klit.description: The successor to BaoBao. A modern, privacy-focused client for the e621 community. Built with user experience and data protection as top priorities.

opentorrent.name: Opentorrent
opentorrent.description: Manage your torrents with Opentorrent, a cross-platform qBittorrent client that brings seamless torrenting to iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, and the Web.

repstore.name: RepStore
repstore.description: Alternative app store for iOS*/Android based on repositories compatible with AltStore repos. Browse and install APKs from repositories with a clean, modern interface.
